meanings.sent1: After making a mistake, she reprocesses the document to correct it.
meanings.sent2: The factory reprocesses old materials to create new products.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally reprocesses the same file multiple times, creating a loop of errors.
meanings.sent4: Her mind constantly reprocesses memories, trying to make sense of them.
meanings.sent5: The computer program reprocesses data at lightning speed, improving efficiency.

meanings.definition: To subject (something) to a further process or treatment.
meanings.sent1: The chef reprocesses the sauce to enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent2: The lab reprocesses samples for more accurate results.
meanings.sent3: The machine reprocesses the material, giving it a shiny new look.
meanings.sent4: The artist reprocesses old paintings, adding new layers of meaning.
meanings.sent5: The company reprocesses waste to reduce environmental impact.
